title: Bitcentral Welcomes Ron Rosenthal As Vice President Of Glob
text:
NEWPORT BEACH, Calif. , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bitcentral continues to position itself as the market leader in news production and distribution systems with the addition of broadcast industry veteran Ron Rosenthal to its leadership team. Rosenthal joins Bitcentral as Vice President of Global Sales and Marketing, reporting directly to CEO Fred Fourcher . Prior to joining Bitcentral, Rosenthal was building Global Account Teams for Imagine Communications. His three-decade career in the broadcast media industry includes various production, operations and transmission management positions at Cablevision Systems Corporation, USA Networks, ABC Television Network, NBC Television Network and others. Deeply invested in the growth and advancement of the broadcast industry, Rosenthal is an active member of the Society of Motion Picture & Television Engineers, the Society of Satellite Professionals International and the North American Broadcasters Association. Rosenthal is based out of the the U.S. broadcast mecca, New York City and will work closely with Fred Fourcher to manage existing sales and account management efforts, build relationships and oversee marketing efforts on a global scale. "Ron has the depth and experience to provide Bitcentral customers with the best solutions for their complex needs, and with his upstanding reputation in the industry, we are honored and excited to welcome him to the Bitcentral team," said Fred Fourcher , CEO at Bitcentral.  
Having served in multiple sales management positions with various companies, Ron brings extensive sales management experience to Bitcentral. "I am extremely excited to join the Bitcentral team. As the broadcast industry prepares itself for some of the greatest technological advancements our industry has seen in over 50 years, Bitcentral is uniquely positioned to provide immediate and long-term solutions to our customers," said Rosenthal. "The combination of the cohesive team, innovative products and collective assets that Fred Fourcher has assembled at Bitcentral over the past 20 years truly excites me. I look forward to developing solutions utilizing the Bitcentral products to enable our customers' success."
The company has experienced a landmark year with its acquisition of the Master Control & Automation software solution Central Control, establishing a presence in Latin American with its offices in Mexico City and Argentina and now the addition of Ron Rosenthal to manage its global sales process. For more information about the organization and its products please visit bitcentral.com or call (949) 253-9000.
